title: Chelsea Football Club is delighted to announce the appointment of Enzo Maresca as new head coach of the men’s team.
snippet: Chelsea Football Club is delighted to announce the appointment of Enzo Maresca as new head coach of the men’s team.

title: List of Chelsea F.C. managers - Wikipedia
snippet: Chelsea have had 32 permanent managers/head coaches (of whom four also served as player-manager), six interim managers and six caretakers. Ron Suart has served as both caretaker and interim manager.

title: Chelsea appoint Enzo Maresca as head coach
snippet: "I look forward to working with ... also confirmed Maresca's coaching staff which includes the club's former goalkeeper, Willy Caballero, as well as the appointment of a set-piece coach in Bernardo Cueva....

title: Next Chelsea manager - footballlondon
snippet: The latest Chelsea news as the Blues have confirmed the appointment of the Italian who has brought six members of his backroom staff from Leicester City with him. ... Enzo Maresca is the new head coach of Chelsea after succeeding Mauricio Pochettino ...
